name: Fast Fuzzy Inference System
short_description: FFIS or Fast Fuzzy Inference System is a portable and optimized implementation of Fuzzy Inference Systems. It supports both Mamdani and Takagi-Sugeno methods. The main idea behind this tool, is to provide case-special techniques rather than general solutions to resolve complicated mathematical calculations. This will lead to have more efficient defuzzification algorithms for Mamdani's model. Most systems in Mamdani's model can be defuzzified in O(n²) or even O(n) time which n is number of membership functions in output.
